Package DynaBlast

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • DynaBlast.Level
  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Class loads level from file to two dimensions char table and from this table loads level to two dimensions Block table. Contains render method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static Block[][] block
      two dimensions table of @Block containing all level blocks
      static char[][] blockList
      two dimensions table of chars containing coded data about level plan receive data from external file by @loadLevelFromFile method
      int[] cellOfEscape
      int table with information where will be escape cell
      int escapeVisible
      flag of escape visible stage 0 -not, 1 - ready to destroy, 2 - ready to escape
      static int margin
      margin from left and top of the window
      boolean restart
      should the level will be restarted
      boolean win
      should be begin win procedure

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Level()
      Creates object of Level

      void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      render each block in two dimensions block table

      restart procedure cleaning enemies, bombs and reloading level
